name: Vegetarian Thai Green Curry Recipe
description: This vegetarian Thai green curry is easy to whip up with creamy coconut milk, fresh vegetables, and simple seasonings.

video.name: Vegetarian green curry recipe, delicious Thai food at home üòç #spicyfood #veggie #thaicurry #thaicurrypaste

recipeInstructions.text: Pour one-third (about 2/3 cup) of the coconut milk into a wok or pot over medium heat. Stir gently and heat until the milk starts to bubble but avoid boiling.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour one-third (about 2/3 cup) of the coconut milk into a wok or pot over medium heat. Stir gently and heat until the milk starts to bubble but avoid boiling.

recipeInstructions.text: Once bubbles form, add green curry paste to the coconut milk. Fry the paste, stirring it for about 30 seconds to a minute, until it‚Äôs fully dissolved and releases its aroma.
recipeInstructions.name: Once bubbles form, add green curry paste to the coconut milk. Fry the paste, stirring it for about 30 seconds to a minute, until it‚Äôs fully dissolved and releases its aroma.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour in the remaining coconut milk. Stir and let the mixture come to a gentle simmer, then season the curry. Stir in palm sugar and salt, mixing well until the palm sugar is completely dissolved.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour in the remaining coconut milk. Stir and let the mixture come to a gentle simmer, then season the curry. Stir in palm sugar and salt, mixing well until the palm sugar is completely dissolved.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the vegetables: yard-long beans, bell peppers, and Thai eggplants. Simmer the curry for several minutes, or until the vegetables are tender. Stir in basil just before taking the wok off the heat and serve immediately.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the vegetables: yard-long beans, bell peppers, and Thai eggplants. Simmer the curry for several minutes, or until the vegetables are tender. Stir in basil just before taking the wok off the heat and serve immediately.

keywords: thai green curry vegetarian, vegetarian curry, vegetarian thai green curry
